dcterms:description: A multi-agent benchmark suite consisting of various unit micromanagement tasks in StarCraft II, where a collaborative team of units needs to defeat an enemy team controlled by built-in AI.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:creator: Oriol Vinyals
Timo Ewalds
Sergey Bartunov
Petko Georgiev
Alexander Sasha Vezhnevets

dcterms:description: A benchmark for reinforcement learning that presents a new challenge using the StarCraft II environment, focusing on complex strategic decision-making.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II (SCII)

dcterms:creator: Wendelin Böhmer
Vitaly Kurin
Shimon Whiteson
dcterms:description: A game-theoretic scenario where agents must coordinate their actions to achieve a common goal, often used to study cooperative behavior in multi-agent systems.
dcterms:title: Stag Hunt

dcterms:description: A collection of algorithms designed for multi-agent reinforcement learning, providing benchmarks for evaluating performance and effectiveness.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) algorithms

dcterms:creator: Yongcan Cao
Wenwu Yu
Wei Ren
Guanrong Chen
dcterms:description: A set of maps used in the StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge, each presenting unique challenges and scenarios for testing multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Various SMAC maps (e.g., corridor, 6h vs 8z, 3m, etc.)
